artist: Maker: Duro Mold and Manufacturing Inc.
description: silver colored horizontal rocket shaped bank; red nose tip; red hat on figure at rear; red spots on engine at rear; coin slot on top; spring mechanism to fire coin into bank
inscription:
Inscription; Decal

decals on each side: [THE/ FIRST NATIONAL BANK/ OF NEW YORK, PA]

on box, PL side: [ROCKET BANK]; on front both sides: [MERCURY]; on rear fin, PR: [PAT. PENDING]; inside base, one side: [MADE BY DURO]; other side: [DETROIT, U.S.A.]
title: "Rocket Bank" mechanical bank
